Name: Weapons Knight
About the game: Trapped and wanting to overthrow the cursed ruler, with a multitude of weapons at your disposal and a fleet of enemies that stop you from progressing, you'll have to fight your way through various terrains to then overthrow the wretched king and claim back what was once yours. MULTIPLE STAGES With a multitude of stages, you'll be able to traverse through different areas of the 'Weapons Knight' world. MULTIPLE WEAPONS With over 10+ weapons at your disposal, you'll be able to quickly cycle through your gallery of weapons and attack foes with what you're given. POWERUPS Weapons Knight comes with a plethora of powerups that will support you through your journey that you can unlock with in-game currency. UPGRADES You'll be able to unlock upgrades to both your gems and how many weapons you have to cycle through, you can purchase these with in-game currency and kills.
